req.2: 2) Erase protective layer from QR code
req.4.a: Those who collect 10 codes have the opportunity to participate in the drawing of a set of sandwiches (200 sets of 5 pieces).
req.4.b: Collected 20 codes have the opportunity to participate in the drawing thermos (200 pieces).
req.4.c: Collected 30 codes have the opportunity to participate in the drawing of mobile station Yandex (10 pieces).
req.4.d: Those who collect 40 codes have the opportunity to participate in the drawing of a bicycle (5 pieces).
req.4.e: Collected 50 codes have the opportunity to participate in the drawing of Xiaomi Redmi 10 (5 pieces).
req.4.f: Collected 60 codes have the opportunity to participate in the drawing of the game console PS4 Slim (3 pieces).
req.4.g: Those who collect 80 codes have the opportunity to participate in the drawing of an electric scooter Xiaomi Mi Electric Scater (3 pieces).
req.4.h: Collected 100 codes have the opportunity to participate in the drawing of a notebook Asus (3 pieces).
req.5: The drawing will be live on our instagram page on March 31, 2022!
req.7: *Kav-Kev employees are not eligible to participate in this contest. *Persons over 18 years of age may participate in the drawing.
footer.2: We have been on the market of Kyrgyzstan since 1999. Only natural products.
